contest-event.event-date:
April 12, 1909 D Abergavenny Contest
Abergavenny Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Abergavenny Contest abergavenny-contest
Verdi's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
Abergavenny, Monmouthshire, Wales, UK Contest held in late afternoon to allow bands that had played at Mountain Ash contest to attend. First four bands placed in same order as at Mountain Ash. 1st prize £17.10s, 2nd prize £10, 3rd prize £5. 7 bands competed.
April 21, 2012, 10:17 a.m. Oct. 9, 2020, 11:24 a.m.
1 Perfection Soap Works William Halliwell
2 Ferndale Samuel Radcliffe
3 Aberaman Thomas Valentine
Unknown Result Aberdare Town Jesse Manley
Unknown Result Mountain Ash Volunteers W. Greenwood
Unknown Result Ogmore Valley Silver Band Samuel Gillard
Unknown Result Cory Band John Bailey
